DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare relapse-free survival patient stage I II endometrial cancer treat adjuvant radiotherapy without cisplatin paclitaxel total abdominal hysterectomy bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy . - Compare pattern recurrence acute late toxicity profile associate treatment regimens patient population . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord disease stage ( IC-IIA v IIB ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Within 8 week surgery , patient receive radiotherapy daily 5 day week 5.5 week . - Arm II : Within 8 week surgery , patient receive radiotherapy arm I concurrently cisplatin IV 2-4 hour day 1 28 . After completion radiotherapy , patient receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour follow cisplatin IV 2-4 hour day 56 , 84 , 112 , 140 . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 436 patient ( 218 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
